last_action: click on the search icon (a magnifying glass) located at the top-right corner of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the search icon (the magnifying glass) located at the top-right corner of the screen, I have opened the search input area. This is a crucial step because now I can type in "Fetch Rewards" to locate the app on the device. This action moves us closer to the user's request to uninstall "Fetch Rewards," as the app must be found before it can be removed.
